code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var userAuthFromLocalStorage=function userAuthFromLocalStorage(){var isAuth=localStorage.getItem('isAuth');if(isAuth&&JSON.parse(isAuth)===true){return true;}return false;};var initialState={isAuth:userAuthFromLocalStorage()};export var authSlice=createSlice({name:'auth',initialState:initialState,reducers:{authenticateUser:function authenticateUser(state){state.isAuth=true;},unauthenticateUser:function unauthenticateUser(state){state.isAuth=false;}}});var _authSlice$actions=authSlice.actions,authenticateUser=_authSlice$actions.authenticateUser,unauthenticateUser=_authSlice$actions.unauthenticateUser;export{authenticateUser,unauthenticateUser};export default authSlice.reducer;
